item.title: 如何写出无法维护的 TS 代码（挫败 Microsoft 试图接管 javascript 的阴谋）
item.description: 如何写出无法维护的 TS 代码（挫败 Microsoft 试图接管 javascript 的阴谋） If builders built buildings the way programmers write programs, then the first woodpecker that came along would destroy civilization. ~ Gerald Weinberg (born: 1933-10-27 age: 77) Weinberg’s Second Law 前言 这篇文章主
